name: Brandi LastName
text: Pizza Pizza. This place is good. My son loves it so much. He's a picky eater too. Its a small place, no where to actually sit down to eat. Usually very friendly employees.

name: ZachGamr
text: This place has closed. The store is vacant.

name: Beverly Booker
text: $5 pizzas hot and ready, what more can you ask for? Even though I prefer the more Gourmet flavors they come at a much higher price! Little Caesars Is My Summer go to for the pool for my kids.

name: Michael Cartledge
text: Great pizza but a little heavy on the sauce for me. If you like lots of sauce, I'm sure you'd rate it as a 5

name: Adam Nevis
text: Good pizza and service! The manager of this store does a great job of running this place!

name: Christy Hopewell
text: We love Little Caesars!  We enjoy the $5 lunch combo.  The man running the restaurant is very friendly and always gives my daughter a bag of the Little Caesars graham cracker cookies.  Usually very fast, in and out.

name: Zack Shepherd
text: Quick pizza.  Worth the extra $ to get extra most bestest.

name: Kelley Hamby
text: Went a few weeks ago with a coupon ( the one you get on the tickets to Sequoyah football games)and they wouldn't honor it, which was fine even tho the guy" owner" was rude I still purchased it. Today, Sept 9, went in and the lady was so …More

name: jlamanac
text: Called in my order last night- Italian cheese bread and a large deep dish pepperoni.  They said it would be ready in 15 mins.  I arrived 15mins later and they said whoever took my order never put it in the computer and it would be 7 more mins if i wanted to wait. I declined.  I won't waste my time with them anymore.

name: Bob Biggs
text: Great pizza. Served hot and fast.

name: Karen Bohannon
text: Great pizza and great price

name: alexander martino
text: Very pleasant, fast, easy and excellent value, much better than other places in the area.

name: JadedDeath 82
text: Quick and always friendly

name: RealLifeLive
text: I'm not sure they understand what "Hot-N--Ready" actually means.

name: Connor McKenzie
text: Nothing remarkable but the pizza is solid for the price.

name: Pat Losack
text: Pretty good pizza.

name: Joshua Burcham
text: Closed @5:30 on Friday night.  :-(

name: Brad Griffiths
text: This store is closed

name: brian dobbins
text: Hot and fresh

name: Eva McLemore
text: 10 minute wait on pizzas.

name: Paul Dillard
text: 12:30 pm today and the doors are locked. They should have been open at 11am today. Open sign is on and the lights, but door is locked and no one answering the phone. This location has given me issues for years but its the only one close to my home.

name: Antonio Jimenez
text: Great Customer Service...

name: Brandt Webster
text: Super cheap great value

name: Ray Clay
text: Bad

name: Carlos Paez
text: (Translated by Google) Simply the best pizza in Peperone ... It's good in everything! The best price! The best flavor! The perfect amount of sauce and peperone ... The other flavors are very good too and the best of all is that there is …More
